english.segment1: ..But Jesus comes to me. While I watch and wait. And long for peace
english.segment2: He is always there. It's where I belong. For the road I'm on is long
english.segment3: Be with Him. I'll be with Him. Until the day I die
english.segment4: And Jesus comes to me. He's my everything. He's all I need (for me)
english.segment5: And His voice I hear (I hear it all the time). He's opened up my eyes. It's clear the reason why
english.segment6: Be with Him. I'll be with Him. Until the day I die
english.segment7: Until the day I die. Jesus comes to lead me on. Taking me home with Him. Where I'll be with Him forever
